snippet: Emergency crews were on the water near the nuclear plant trying to contain and clean up fluid that leaked from the reactor.
abstract: Indian Point nuclear reactor remains offline following transformer fire that sent thousands of gallons of oil and transformer fluid into the Hudson River only 30 miles north of Manhattan; emergency crews remain on river attempting to contain leakage.
lead_paragraph: Emergency crews were on the water near the nuclear plant trying to contain and clean up fluid that leaked from the reactor.

headline.main: Indian Point Plant Remains Offline After a Fire
headline.print_headline: A Reactor at Indian Pt. is Still Offline After a Fire
